Text: You look sad, what`s going on?

Yes, that`s correct. Our lord King Sancho wants   me to abandon kingdom, because he doesn`t belive  my nobility. I tried to prove it bringing him my  father`s signet, but I can`t find it. Please help me with it, I`ll pay you well!
Will you help me? It has to be somewhere in the   Miraflorida city
Thanks! Look for it. My father`s grave is in the  island on the northwest, I think you can find someclue there.. But beware the cementery, people saysit`s cursed!
Oh no? Well I`ll have to look for it myself
Go, look for it, try to search in the cementery!!
God bless you! You have made it!
Event: quest Mieszko Family Signet has been completed

Text: Please take the reward, I think you deserved it   well! Now I can go back to the castle!
Event: quest Mieszko Family Signet has been rewarded

Text: Thanks for your help. Now I`m again one of the    king`s cavaliers! We will ride the north island tofind the cure for the curse
